original_text: And he commanded the chariot to stop, and they both went down into the water, Philip and the eunuch, and he baptized him.
korean_text: 이에 명하여 수레를 멈추고 빌립과 내시가 둘 다 물에 내려가 빌립이 세례를 베풀고

sentences.original_text: And he commanded the chariot to stop
and they both went down into the water
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 둘 다 물로 내려갔습니다
